text: "Marathon" is a 1985 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush and is the fourth track from their 11th studio album Power Windows. The live version was released on their live album A Show of Hands single and went to number 6 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart in 1989. == References == Category:1985 songs Category:1989 songs Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Art pop songs Category:Rush (band) songs
title: Marathon (Rush song)
